mapper.select: SELECT ur.user_role_code AS role_code, ur.role_type AS role_type, 'ForFunction' AS role_scope FROM bpm_user_role ur JOIN bpm_user_role_relation urr ON ur.user_role_code = urr.user_role_code JOIN act_id_membership m ON urr.group_id = m.group_id_ WHERE m.user_id_ = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT pr.role_code AS role_code, pr.role_type AS role_type, 'ForProcess' AS role_scope FROM bpm_proc_role pr JOIN bpm_proc_role_relation prr ON pr.role_code = prr.proc_role_code JOIN act_id_membership m ON prr.group_id = m.group_id_ WHERE m.user_id_ = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
